contact.description: We are a social network committed to the conservation and sustainability of our urban environment, engaging together with neighbors in environmental actions that positively impacts our homes, communities and cities living standards.

about.title: Hello, we are ama!
about.desc:
A social network that connects citizens interested in the global sustainable development agenda. We create remunerable activities to encourage new habits, contribute to a social environmental education, and generate relevant data for cities.

A positive cycle which benefits you and the planet.

Join us!

jobs_ods.title: SDG TASKS
jobs_ods.sub_title: Our goal is to educate, connect and reward people to collaborate to the management of urban environmental issues
jobs_ods.description: The greater the number of people, the more issues to tackle. By supporting cities in the implementation of the 2030 Agenda at the micro level, AMA plays a fundamental role in the municipalization of the SDGs through tasks, research and environmental actions designed for the population.
